title: BRONZE R5 Team Recruitment to CLimb out of bronze
body:
Alright im sure there are people out there in B5 who cant climb out of bronze, due to throwing and unskilled players.
Im starting up a Team and looking for recruits out there. It is preferred that you can play anywhere but main a certain position. Age would be a big thing for me dont want anyone aged under 16 for obvious reasons, too immature and dont have full grasp or understanding of how to proper a play a moba.

Hit us up on here for an add, looking at teaming 3-4 times a week at least, im on every night/evening.

Hit us Up lads lets get out of Bronze Hell.

IhakaNZ {{champion:54}}

replies.body: If you are still interested in playing, add me and be on over the weekend and we can all play a few games together to see if it works. i am B4, ADC/MID main. play a mean Jinx, Quinn and LB, Kassadin. Average 2.0 KDR on all of them and always objective focused.
Added you, hit us up and we'll make the climb.

im keen... would like to know the name of the team :)

Top lane gnar main btw

add : SoSinister
FateNix is the team name ill add you now

Hey man im keen :)

add: eree

Keen bro, just add me, we play a game together, you see how I play and we go from there man. 

I sent an invite to you. 

DreadlockedRasta

Keen bro, just add me, we play a game together, you see how I play and we go from there man.
